Text: Hi Mantesh thanks for all these great books. Learnt alot from them. I have a request if its possible, could you get the Matthew Gardson's Method. I'm heard a lot of buzz about this hairloss book and its effectiveness but am still a little sceptical as there are no legitimate testimonials or interviews with the guy. would be great if I could have a look before I decide to give the guy my 15 bucks. thanks!
